project.name: T³
project.description: T³ (teecube) stands for TIBCO Enterprise Extensions, it provides Maven plugins for Application Lifecycle Management (TIC), advanced components (TAC) and cloud-enabler features (TOE) for TIBCO products and projects.

properties.ecosystemDescription: ${ecosystemName} (${ecosystemPhoneticName}) stands for ${ecosystemFullName}, it provides Maven plugins for Application Lifecycle Management (${ticName}), advanced components (${tacName}) and cloud-enabler features (${toeName}) for TIBCO products and projects.
properties.ecosystemSlogan2: T³ = TIC TAC TOE
properties.ecosystemSumUp: ${ecosystemNameHighlight} is a modular & full-featured, open-source solution to improve development & management of TIBCO applications.
properties.ecosystemSumUpRaw: ${ecosystemName} is a modular, plugin-based, full-featured, open-source solution to improve development & management of TIBCO applications.

configuration.source: import java.util.Date import java.text.MessageFormat def vartimestamp = MessageFormat.format("{0,date,yyyy}", new Date()) project.properties['currentYear'] = vartimestamp

properties.nonEndorsement: with as an open source initiative, not endorsed by TIBCO.
properties.commandLineStart: ${command-title}
properties.configTextStart: ${config-title}
